item.title: Letv reaches one million Facebook likes within two months
item.description:
Source: Socialbakers. Letv, a company that has yet to formally debut in India, has already amassed a following of one million on Facebook in just 60 days. According to Socialbakers, Letv is currently the top and fastest-growing phone brand page in India. In contrast, it took Xiaomi India more than 400 days to achieve the same milestone*. Over the past month, Letv has consistently ranked high in Facebook popularity, rivaling established brands like HTC, Motorola, Lava, Vivo, and Xiaomi in India...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/letv-reaches-one-million-facebook-likes-within-two-months/
